body_html:
@philipz I meant those instructions maybe helpful for getting Bazel building on the Pi as a necessary step towards getting TensorFlow working. If you got past that point it maybe worth looking at #445 where the specific problems around that were being tracked.

You shouldn't be linking against CUDA for a Pi build!
body_text:
@philipz I meant those instructions maybe helpful for getting Bazel building on the Pi as a necessary step towards getting TensorFlow working. If you got past that point it maybe worth looking at #445 where the specific problems around that were being tracked.
You shouldn't be linking against CUDA for a Pi build!
body:
@philipz I meant those instructions maybe helpful for getting _Bazel_ building on the Pi as a necessary step towards getting TensorFlow working. If you got past that point it maybe worth looking at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/445 where the specific problems around that were being tracked.

You shouldn't be linking against CUDA for a Pi build!
